organization.alternate_name: COUNSELING MINISTRY OF SOUTH FLORIDA CMSF
organization.description:
Samaritan Counseling Centers is an interfaith, non-profit, bilingual organization with a mission of providing spiritually-sensitive, professional and affordable mental health counseling, education, and consultation services throughout Broward, Miami-Dade, and Palm Beach Counties. Mental health counseling includes individual counseling and psychotherapy, couples and family therapy, group therapy, and pastoral counseling.

Offices located in Miami, Pinecrest, Bal Harbour, Coral Gables, Miami Beach, Hialeah and Miami Shores.
organization.name: SAMARITIAN COUNSELING CENTERS, INC.
